## Required information
 - Steam64: `76...`

- [ ] I declare I am submitting this issue for my own account or; for the account owned by someone else who requested me to submit this issue on their behalf.

### Additional Reading

Please understand that your inventory data was publicly visible to anyone on the internet at the time I built this dataset. If you are not comfortable with that being public, you may at your option, make your inventory Private or Friends Only on the [Steam Profile Privacy Settings](https://steamcommunity.com/id/temporarily_unavailable/edit/settings).
